title: Fallout 5: everything we know so far
description: Fallout 5 is likely a very long ways off, but that doesn't mean we're completely in the dark. Here's what we know about the game so far.

title: Fallout 5: everything we know so far
description: Fallout 5 is probably a few years out at least. Here's everything we know so far about the upcoming RPG.
